attributes.title: One True Game-a-thon
attributes.caption: Blizz gathers some of Rooster Teeth's best gamers and challenges them to find out who is the best gamer of them all!
attributes.description: CALLING ALL GAMERS. Welcome to One True Game-a-thon. Join Blaine, Chad, Griff and Joe as they compete in challenges that may or may not have anything to do with gaming, but deals with A LOT of pain.

attributes.title: Bottoms Up: The Movie: The Game
attributes.caption: It's Team RTP versus Team Extra Life in the most disgusting and challenging game of beer pong to ever grace the heavens.
attributes.description: Host Andrew Rosas pits Armando Torres and Griff Milton of Team RTP again Jack Pattillo & Chad James of Team Extra Life in the world's most disgusting and vile game of beer pong, but hey, it's for the tots.
attributes.display_title: Bottoms Up: The Movie: The Game

attributes.title: The Spice is Right
attributes.caption: Let's light the flame in the Spice is right to see who can handle the spiciest foods while answering questions!
attributes.description: It's the Spice is Right, the spiciest game show around. Our contestants will compete in a series of gameshow games where the winners receive our grand prize -- absolutely nothing! And the losers? They get the "privilege" of eating the spiciest foods we were legally able to get our hands on.

attributes.title: You Can't Say That!
attributes.caption: Join the Rooster Teeth BRGs (Gallos Unidos, Iridescence, BE, W@RT, ART, & Disabilities) as they play racy(racist?) party games to separate fact from fiction!
attributes.description: The BRG leads have fashioned a game in the likes of potentially problematic party games, playing through a deck of statements involving various identities, and discuss what is true and false all in the name of raising money for Extra Life.

attributes.title: Whose Spot is it Anyway?
attributes.caption: Jon hosts Blaine, Chris, Jessica, and Zach through several On The Spot games in the style of "Whose Line is it Anyway?".
attributes.description: Join Jon, Blaine, Chris, Jessica, and Zach for Extra Life 2023 as they decide how far back to travel in time, plan one last heist, and have a good ole fashioned hoedown.

attributes.title: Quiet Quest
attributes.caption: Welcome to Quiet Quest, a series of games done under the watchful of eye of our Armando & Blizz. The knights of RT will try to complete each trial in total silence.
attributes.description: The 2032 Digital Content Creators split into 2 teams of RT Knights. Under the watchful eyes(and ears!) of Blizz and Armando, can they complete their tasks as quietly as possible? Will the one team successfully save the RT kingdom? Will they compete tasks in Fear pong, egg racing, and Troll battling? Will this be the first game of Extra Life to involve paintball? You'll have to watch to find out!

attributes.title: Fatal Operation
attributes.caption: BFT tries to sabotage one another, while Armando, Santiago, and Cat revel in punishing them during a unique life sized game of Operation.
attributes.description: Join Best Friends Today as they compete to "heal" their patient during a life sized game of Operation. Tune in to see if they can complete the operation without getting punished!

attributes.title: F**KFace Break Stuff for Extra Life
attributes.caption: Just a normal round of card opening with Geoff and Eric.
attributes.description: The F**k Face boys open up some rather unique and expensive cards during this giant double epsiode of Break Stuff. Join them as they decide what to "preserve" and what to shred! What lengths will they go to for their craft? What lengths will Chad go through to prevent them? Tune in to find out!
attributes.display_title: F**KFace Break Stuff for Extra Life

attributes.title: Dogbark's Hot 'n Thicc - Extra Life 2023
attributes.caption: It's 'bout to get hot, but also it's 'bout to get thicc.
attributes.description: The Dogbark boys are ready for a game night packed full of their favorite games, plenty to drink, and more chicken than they could ask for. The only problem is that the chicken is way too hot 'n the liquids are way too thicc. Will they be able to survive the segment while their mouths are on fire and their drinks bring them no solace?

attributes.title: Werewolves!
attributes.caption: As night falls, the werewolves come out to play.  Join the RoosterTeeth crowd in this classic game of deception.
attributes.description: It's midnight and time for the werewolves to come out and play. Join Kyle Taylor as he leads a wide collection of friends and foes through this extra life classic game of deception! Donations will increase the punishments people suffer from dying!

attributes.title: Red Web's "Are You Afraid Yet?!"
attributes.caption: Red Web Faces Their Fears!
attributes.description: Task Force HQ reads spooky stories around the campfire before facing their fears. r/nosleep stories by u/searchandrescuewoods

attributes.title: Scaredy Cat Hour
attributes.caption: The biggest scaredy cats at Rooster Teeth play a horror game in the name of charity.
attributes.description: You thought Phasmophobia was scary? Try playing Demonologist. Watch Blizz, BK, Griff & Nick get their pants scared off failing at exercising demons where donations only increase the scare factor

attributes.title: Facilities L33t B3@T Off
attributes.caption: The sweatiest, most ridiculous, 80's jazzercise work out Extra Life has to offer.
attributes.description: Host Jock Strap Jonny and his Co-host The Master Beater take the audience throiugh an 80s style spandex filled aerobics workout Segment. People not doing "enough" to workout are sent to the 'sweat box" to play Beatsaber at ridiculous speeds with tons of fun punishments.

attributes.title: Extra Life 2023: Uno After Dark
attributes.caption: Team Extra Life is joined by Armando, Ky, BK, Lindsay, and God herself to play a round of UNO that is anything but normal.
attributes.description: Join Caiti, Chad, Armando, Ky, BK, and Lindsay as they play a chaotic round of UNO over 18 hours into Extra LIfe. Donations cause players to switch their hands and house rules require players to "knock" before saying UNO. Anything can happen in this chaotic segment! Join our players as they wrestle with no sleep while competiting in a card game that has been known to end friendships!

attributes.title: Always Open Brunch Hour
attributes.caption: Join Barbara, Armando, Blizz, Lindsay, Jessica, and Laurel Rothamel for a special "brunch" edition of Always Open! Watch them sip on mimosas, answer some spicy questions, and shower each other in complements!
attributes.description: Join Barbara, Armando, Blizz, Lindsay, Jessica, and Laurel Rothamel for a special "brunch" edition of Always Open! Watch them sip on mimosas, answer some spicy questions, and shower each other in complements!

attributes.title: Extra Life 2023: The Final Stretch and Send Off
attributes.caption: Join Chad, Kerry, Lindsay, and the Death Battle crew as they attempt to play the Death Battle Card & Dice game while torturing a very sleep deprived Chad in the process. Then say goodbye with us as we send off Extra Life 2023!
attributes.description: Chad, Kerry, Lindsay, Maggie, and others from the animation team close out the 24 hours of live streaming with Extra Life for a nice and chill Death Battle game. Nothing can possibly go wrong...right? Join these chaos goblins for the final stretch of Extra Life 2023 with crazy donation incentives, unhinged banter, and a heartfelt send off as Rooster Teeth says goodbye to another successful Extra Life. This segment has everything!
attributes.display_title: Extra Life 2023: The Final Stretch and Send Off
